hero.p: We provide comprehensive dental care with a focus on quality and comfort.

about_us.p1: Welcome to our dental clinic in Tirana, Albania . We specialize in providing world-class dental care for international patients, especially those traveling from Italy. Our mission is to ensure every patient receives high-quality, affordable treatments in a comfortable and modern environment.
about_us.p2: Whether you're visiting Tirana for tourism or dental care, we're here to make your experience exceptional.

dental_cleaning.title: Dental Cleaning
dental_cleaning.description: Keep your smile sparkling with our professional cleaning services. Remove stubborn plaque and enhance oral health effortlessly.

aesthetic.title: Aesthetic
aesthetic.description: Perfectly aligned teeth are just a step away. Explore advanced aesthetic solutions designed with comfort and precision in mind.

general_surgery.title: General Surgery
general_surgery.description: Don‚Äôt let unexpected dental issues ruin your day. Our team is here to provide immediate assistance, anytime you need it.

technology.title: Advanced Dental Technology
technology.description: Experience the latest in dental advancements with our state-of-the-art technology. From precise imaging and laser treatments to same-day restorations, we provide efficient, pain-free, and customized solutions for a healthier, brighter smile.
technology.tap-to-flip: Tap to flip and see more!

services.title: Advanced Imaging Technology
services.description: Precise, low-radiation digital X-rays and 3D scans for accurate diagnoses.

services.title: Laser Dentistry
services.description: Pain-free treatments with advanced laser technology for faster healing.

services.title: Same-Day Restorations
services.description: Custom crowns, bridges, and veneers made in one visit with CEREC.

gallery.title: Explore Our Stomatology Clinic
gallery.description: Take a look at our state-of-the-art clinic, designed to offer the best care for your oral health.

timeline.title: A Streamlined Treatment Plan
timeline.subtitle: What to Expect From Our Team We've carefully planned every aspect of your visit to ensure a comfortable and seamless experience.

steps.title: Initial Contact
steps.description: You can reach us by phone, email, or through our online contact form. Our friendly staff will assist you with any questions and help you schedule your first consultation. Or you can come directly to our clinic to schedule your appointment in person. Our team will be happy to assist you with immediate registration and appointment booking.

steps.title: Schedule Appointment
steps.description: Once you‚Äôve made your initial contact, we will schedule your first consultation at your convenience. You will receive a confirmation email or message with your appointment details.

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: Meet our dental professionals who will perform a comprehensive evaluation. Discuss any concerns you have about your dental health. Receive an explanation of your treatment options and the best path forward for your needs. A treatment plan will be customized for you, including cost and estimated timeline.

steps.title: Treatment Plan Review
steps.description: We‚Äôll walk you through the details of your treatment plan, ensuring that you understand all steps, costs, and expected outcomes. Any questions or concerns you may have will be addressed thoroughly.

steps.title: Scheduling Treatment
steps.description: Once you approve your treatment plan, we‚Äôll schedule the necessary procedures. Our team will work with your availability and provide reminders as your appointment approaches.

steps.title: Treatment Day
steps.description: Arrive at the clinic and check in with our receptionist. Our dental team will guide you through the necessary steps and ensure your comfort throughout the procedure. Treatment will be performed with precision and care to achieve the best outcome.

steps.title: Post-Treatment Care
steps.description: After the treatment, we‚Äôll give you specific instructions for post-care to ensure the healing process goes smoothly. Any necessary follow-up appointments will be scheduled to monitor your recovery.

comments.text: Fantastic service and friendly staff! Highly recommended.
comments.author: - John Doe

comments.text: Amazing experience, my teeth have never felt better!
comments.author: - Jane Smith

comments.text: Professional and caring team, they really make you feel at ease.
comments.author: - Mike Brown
